name: Animal Rush (DylanTheSoldier)
description:
Here is my portfolio project called animal rush. This is a top down shooter which is a spinoff of one of the learning projects from the Unity learn platform.

I've built all the scripts in this project and leveraged one external package ScriptableObjectArchitecture to implement the concepts of runtime sets, and scriptableobject variables from Ryan Hipples Unite Talk. 

GitHub

I implemented:

  • Sceneloading
  • Player movement with/ Transform Translate & NavMesh
  • ScriptableObjects { Player Health, Scoring,  ScriptableEvents }
  • Level Designed w/ Ultimate Low Poly Asset Pack Assets
  • Simple HUD for battle and main map
  • ParticleSystem with smoke
  • Audio from audio asset pack
  • Everything Else
